mapper.sql: id, cust_id, status, type, meta_data, eff_date, exp_date, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: insert into tb_vip_info (id, cust_id, status, meta_data, type, eff_date, exp_date, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{metaData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_vip_info set cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eff_date = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exp_date = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
